title: Part time jobs
content:
Dear seniors, I am a first year student. I want to earn money through part time jobs. However I don't want to put any burden on my parents. Unfortunately I didn't even completed learning python, but stared learning C this sem. 
So i am seeking your valuable suggestions. 

If anyone knows of any part time jobs or ways to earn money , I would be grateful to hear from you. 
Please , any suggestion in this moment mean a lot to me.....

comments.body: I started working in my first year. Part time internships can help. Internshala is where i got my first internship, i had to apply to 100+ place. You can also tutor high school students. PESU IO is decent. Try asking your professors for TAs.
The other option is to study real hard and get the cnr or the mrd scolarship.

You could start scrubbing floors and dusting cabinets.
What kind of question is this? You don't know anything, don't want to learn anything, but still want work and money? Think of it from the POV of a guy who needs work done? Why would anyone pay you? What would you do for them?
Go learn something first, the work will come on its own and money will follow suite soon enough.
